mapper.insert: insert into jw_renyuan (gonghao, shenfenzheng, xingming, xingbie, nianling, dianhua, zhiwei, ruzhishijian, chezu, jibengongzi, xueli, minzu, zaizhi, beizhu) values (#{gonghao}, #{shenfenzheng}, #{xingming}, #{xingbie}, #{nianling}, #{dianhua},#{zhiwei}, #{ruzhishijian}, #{chezu}, #{jibengongzi}, #{xueli}, #{minzu}, #{zaizhi}, #{beizhu})
mapper.update: update jw_renyuan set gonghao = #{gonghao}, shenfenzheng = #{shenfenzheng}, xingming = #{xingming}, xingbie = #{xingbie}, nianling = #{nianling}, dianhua = #{dianhua}, zhiwei = #{zhiwei}, ruzhishijian = #{ruzhishijian}, chezu = #{chezu}, jibengongzi = #{jibengongzi}, xueli = #{xueli}, minzu = #{minzu}, zaizhi = #{zaizhi}, beizhu = #{beizhu} where ID = #{ID}
